lines: The crowd cheers.  Aldous PUNCHES HIMSELF IN THE HEAD OVER AND OVER AGAIN, turning his head into a bloody mess.  We then CUT BACK TO THE EXECUTIVES.
There’s no way this could get any worse.
Aw!/That did not just happen!/Jesus fucking Christ!
He’s wanted in Sardinia for attempted manslaughter.  Or at least that’s what I read on gawker.
